body:
http://irc.lc/esper/Avicus
WARNING: Upon joining your IP shows. It's a feature. 

This is the unofficial internet relay channel for discussions with other players as an alternative to using the forum. With this, staff will be given promotions by PMing me on Skype and this is just a neat little thing I wanted to do. Anyone can connect, and it's more interactive and user friendly. With it's simplicity, it should be enjoyable to just sit down and chat with the community with messages such as "Join MCZone01" or "I'm leaving Avicus" or "Come check out my map" in which the IRC will be more lenient to rules. However, use common sense when using the channel. Keep your username the exact same as your IGN, and keep it casual.

I'm well aware this channel might die out, or be inactive, but it's there.
